check.name: MethodCount
check.description: Marker class used to collect data about the number of methods per class. Objects of this class are used on the Stack to count the methods for each class and layer. <EOF>

property.name: maxTotal
property.description: Specify the maximum number of methods allowed at all scope levels.

property.name: maxPrivate
property.description: Specify the maximum number of {@code private} methods allowed.

property.name: maxPackage
property.description: Specify the maximum number of {@code package} methods allowed.

property.name: maxProtected
property.description: Specify the maximum number of {@code protected} methods allowed.

property.name: maxPublic
property.description: Specify the maximum number of {@code public} methods allowed.
